*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Rio Grande, January 3, 1881. Instructions concerning land. Political conditions.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Rio Grande*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-03-1831">3 Jany. 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*I have just arrived at this place, and as the mail is on the point of leaving I drop you a line. I am comfortably lodged with *person_mentioned*Dn Juan Francisco Lombaña*/person_mentioned* whom I think a very gentlemanly man.*/p*
*p*I shall detain here one day for the *person_mentioned*escort */person_mentioned*to get ready. The [re] appears to be nothing new that I have heard of—tho have made no inquiries. *person_mentioned*Padre Musquis*/person_mentioned* has gone on.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*[George] Nixon*/person_mentioned* has expressed so much anxiety to be on good terms again that I have agreed to it and wrote you by him stating that he could [have] a League where it was entirely unappropriated— the best conquest that can be made over an enemy is to convert him into a friend. I told him that he could not get any *location_mentioned*forfeited League*/location_mentioned*. On reflection as to the *location_mentioned*Lindsey League*/location_mentioned*—I think it had better be held, for the present. After my arrival at *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*I think I can get your petition granted, and if so you are more entitled to that *location_mentioned*League */location_mentioned*than any one else, and you shall have my support to get it— but keep this to yourself. Send instructions to *person_mentioned*S. P. Brown*/person_mentioned* how to regulate his chain to the *location_mentioned*Mexican */location_mentioned*Measure. He sent me word by *person_mentioned*Williamson */person_mentioned*that he had forgotten the difference between the *location_mentioned*Mexican*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*english */location_mentioned*measure.*/p*
*p*If *person_mentioned*young Tumlinson*/person_mentioned* applies for a place up *location_mentioned*on Navidad */location_mentioned*let him have one—he is the best of that *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Remember me to *person_mentioned*Sarah */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Mrs. Sweet*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. M. Williams */person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] Al *person_mentioned*Señor Dn Samuel Williams*/person_mentioned*, en *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
